Detailed Description

Loads an XML description of a keyboard and stores the attributes of the keys(IMEKeyboardKey).

A keyboard consists of rows(IMEKeyboardRow) of keys. 

 #include <gaia/service/IMEKeyboard.h>
 using namespace gaia::service;

 class MyKeyboard : public IMEKeyboard {
   //members and function declaration here
 };

 MyKeyboard* myKeyboard = new MyKeyboard(IMEService, Resource_ID);
 myKeyboard->initializer(IMEService, Resource_ID);
 delete myKeyboard;

virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboard::isShifted ( ) [virtual]

Returns the state of the shift key of the keyboard.

Returns:
True if the shift state is in a pressed state, false otherwise. If there is no shift key on the keyboard or there is no keyboard attached, it returns false.
virtual bool gaia::service::IMEKeyboard::setShifted ( bool  shifted) [virtual]

Set the state of the shift key of the keyboard.

Parameters:
[in]shiftedTrue to enable the state of the shift key, false otherwise.
Returns:
True if the shift key state changed, false if there was no change.
